0.0.3.en: Replace widget preview pictures + replace driver image + Add licens comment in description

0.0.5.en: Fixing floor mapping and switching issues

0.0.6.en: Trying to fix floor finalizing by adding waittime for finalization

0.0.7.en: Fix map file handling, add no-dock segmentation trigger, fix SSH reboot path, add Roborock S5 driver

0.0.8.en: Add error alarm for Homey Insights, fix widget for multi-driver support

0.0.9.en: Always trigger segmentation after mapping if segments don't appear

0.1.0.en: Add Roborock S5 driver, error alarm insights, widget multi-driver support, auto segmentation trigger, wait for map after reboot, Roborock S5 product images

0.1.1.en: Fix flow cards not being available on the Roborock S5 driver. Flow triggers, conditions and actions are now shared between the Valetudo and Roborock S5 drivers as originally intended.

0.1.2.en: Fix segment room names not appearing in flow card autocompletes. Segments are now fetched via REST on discovery, reconnect, and after cleaning â€” ensuring the list is always populated regardless of MQTT configuration.

0.1.3.en: Add 'Refresh room segments' flow action. Clear stale segment cache when switching floors.
